message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take a bit less, you take a bit less. We can negotiate from here.
I'll start with a 50/50 split. Your turn!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. I'll take a bit more, but I'm still willing to give you a decent chunk. Let's meet in the middle!
I'll take a slightly larger share this time. You can try to negotiate from here.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, Bob. Let's split it 50/50. It's getting late in the game, and I'm not sure we'll get a better deal.
